title: Using school PC that won't connect to chat service
body:
Hi, I am using my school PC that has Light Speed Mobile Filter and was wondering how to connect to chat service. It is definitely possible because I know someone at the school who has overridden Light speed and was able to do what ever.(Any sites, installs, downloads, Etc.)

He will not tell me and he is trying to charge me money so i can learn the ways.

Its not that the school doesn't want me playing LOL, its just I cannot connect to chat which makes it hard to communicate in the champion select screen.


Please Help me solve my problem and send me your IG name so I can friend and maybe even mystery gift you whatever.



Thanks,
RealHiccupSneeze{{champion:115}}

replies.body: I couldn't recommend trying to bypass settings set by your school.  You'll want to hit up your school IT to have them work with you to allow communications with our servers.  You can also use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in case any local issues might be the culprit as well.  Good luck!
